sentence: On the very next play, Rams quarterback Matthew Stafford, in shotgun formation, is surveying Tampa Bay’s coverage when center Brian Allen unexpectedly snaps the ball.
title: ‘This is officially lunacy’: The eight crazy plays that capped the Rams’ win

sentence: Kupp, who had nine catches for 183 yards, lost a fumble, and the offense failed to take advantage of Miller sacking Brady to a force a fumble at the Tampa Bay 25 when center Brian Allen snap sailed past Stafford in shotgun formation and recovered by the Bucs.
author: Fred Goodall
title: Last-second FG lifts Rams over Brady, Buccaneers

sentence: Center Brian Allen (55) could have his hands full with defenders in the middle.
author: Barry Wilner
title: NFC Matchup: Old West rivals meet for Super Bowl berth

sentence: The interior line contains two draft picks - center Brian Allen and left guard David Edwards - along with right guard Austin Corbett, a trade acquisition from Cleveland in 2019.

title: Bold, brash Rams pair flashy superstars with rock-solid core

sentence: Let’s not let fear of what if it doesn’t work out keep us from maybe getting that edge.” Some hard personnel decisions are upcoming for the champs, who have 11 unrestricted free agents (including Miller, Beckham – who reportedly had already begun contract talks with the Rams – Sony Michel, and offensive linemen Joe Noteboom, Brian Allen and Austin Corbett), and five restricted free agents (including linebacker Troy Reeder and kicker Matt Gay).
author: Jim Alexander
title: Alexander: Rams’ Super Bowl title a reward for Les Snead’s boldness

sentence: Free agency is only four weeks away, and the Rams must make decisions on several key players: Miller, receiver Odell Beckham Jr., starting cornerback Darious Williams, offensive linemen Brian Allen and Austin Corbett, and defensive lineman Sebastian Joseph-Day.
title: Rams bask in Super Bowl win, hope Sean McVay, Aaron Donald want another

sentence: But check out Brian Allen at the point of attack against an NT about 40lbs heavier than him.

sentence: Since Monday, when teams could start negotiating with other teams’ free agents, the Rams have not announced any acquisitions, while they’ve re-signed tackle Joe Noteboom – groomed as retiring left tackle Andrew Whitworth’s successor – and center Brian Allen and guard-center Coleman Shelton.
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Rams lose Von Miller after Bills come with cash

sentence: Advertising Skip AdSkip AdSkip Ad The Rams managed to retain offensive linemen Joseph Noteboom and Brian Allen, two probable starters next season.

title: LA Rams release punter Johnny Hekker after memorable decade

sentence: They moved to prevent a mass exodus from the offensive line by re-signing starting center Brian Allen as well as new left tackle Joe Noteboom and guard/center Coleman Shelton.

title: Rams face new questions after first week of moves

sentence: The team did resign some key free agents along the offensive line including starting center Brian Allen.

sentence: “Just having time to spend time with what you don’t know, and figure it out and get through those hoops, is huge,” said center Brian Allen, who spent a year as understudy to veteran John Sullivan after being drafted in the fourth round in 2018, and wound up anchoring the Rams’ offensive line in 2021.
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Rams’ draft approach requires rookies to develop one key trait – patience
